body.name: EarlySincere Smart Watches for Men Women, 1.9'' HD Full Touch Screen Fitness Tracker, IP67 Waterproof Smartwatch with Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen Blood Pressure, Sleep Monitor for Android and iPhone
features: 🎁【Bluetooth Call/AI Voice】-Smart watch adopts advanced Bluetooth 5.0, built-in high-fidelity waterproof speaker and microphone, the smartwatches supports one-click answering and dialing, whether it is doing housework, running, cycling, playing, etc. The watch adopts an exclusive AI voice algorithm, double-click to wake up the voice assistant to completely liberate your hands, and complete the command operation through the AI voice assistant.

🎁【HD touch screen】-1.9-inch frame high-definition large screen brings you a clearer and more open visual enjoyment. The watch has a rotating side button, which can directly turn pages or scroll up, making the operation more portable. The smart watch accumulates modern industrial aesthetics and practicality. Excellent strength alloy body, and more skin-friendly silicone material strap, simple and versatile, ergonomic design, more friendly for long-term wear.

🎁【Wrist Health Center】-The smart watch adopts optical heart rate, and through scientifically quantified big data, it can easily monitor daily blood pressure, blood oxygen, respiration, sleep, motivate you to live a healthier life, let you know your health status at any time, and encourage you to develop a good health With regular work and rest, Watches has 123 sports modes, allowing you to keep track of your sports status, adjust your sports plan, and help you record more accurate sports data.

🎁【Women's Health】-The smart watch can perform women's menstrual calculation, whether you have regular or irregular menstrual cycle, can track your life and record your cycle diary, easily manage your women's physiological health problems, let you Before the date arrives, be prepared to travel in advance.

🎁【Rich life assistants】-The smart watch comes with IP67 waterproof and dustproof design to meet the basic waterproof needs of daily life. The watch has weather forecast, remote photography, music control, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, calculator, mobile phone and other life assistants. Poly watch, built-in Da-fit interesting stand-alone games, let you spend time on the watch in your spare time, giving you an extraordinary life experience.

Intelligent Heart Rate Monitoring Autonomous Heart Health Management Using a high-performance heart rate sensor, the data is more immediate and accurate, intelligently identifying abnormal heart rate and other conditions, allowing you to understand your physical condition. Sleep Well at Night Smart Wotch performs automatic sleep monitoring at night, and intelligently recognizes and records your deep sleep, light sleep, and wakefulness, quantifies your sleep quality so that you can better understand your sleep state, and your healthy sleepy eyes are more clear at a glance.

Ai Intelligent Voice The watch adopts an exclusive AI voice algorithm, double-click to wake up the voice assistant to completely liberate your hands, and complete the command operation through the AI voice assistant.

Go To The App Watch Face Market to Download More Beautiful Watch Faces! This watch has a large number of different styles of dials for you to choose and change. When you go to different occasions and wear different clothes, you can choose a dial that matches your clothes. There are five classic dials in the watch, Of course, you have more choices, go to the Da Fit APP dial market to download more colorful dials, and you can also customize, use your favorite photos as the dial background, your own watch, and have your own style!

Weather Forecast Real-time grasp of weather changes and weather conditions in the coming week. Outing, travel, before going out, please check the weather forecast, low temperature, please wear more clothes. Eight Menus to Switch at Will Rich preset menus to meet diversified aesthetics, quickly double-click the upper side button on the menu interface to select the corresponding menu style. Health Smart Reminder Decompression and sleep aid, when you feel too stressed, you can also relax through decompression breathing Drink water reminder, remind you to remember to drink water Sedentary reminder, when you have been inactive for too long, you will receive intimate reminders.

Calculate Your Exercise Data Smartwatches can count your exercise time, calorie burn, heart rate, and more to keep you motivated, or keep going, and see how you've been doing recently. Long Battery Life The use of high-performance lithium batteries, upgraded power management and optimization, greatly improves power consumption, and can be used for 5 to 7 days on a single charge. Whether you go out for sports or leisure entertainment, you don't need to worry about power. Free Components Custom components can be freely set, according to your lifestyle, and use of portable, you can anytime and anywhere you want to set the function, your frequently used function in the most prominent position, let you see it at first sight.

Rich Life Assistant, 123 Sports Modes After the APP is connected and paired, the watch can vibrate to remind, push and receive various messages synchronously in real time, synchronize with the mobile phone, support SMS reminder/push, Facebook\Twitter and other social application messages. The smart watch has various small functions such as breathing exercise, message reminder, call rejection, text message reminder, time alarm clock, music control, remote control mobile phone camera, stopwatch, countdown and so on. It supports 123 sports modes such as mountaineering, cycling, hiking, etc. The highlight moment of each exercise is accurately recorded by the watch, and personalized sports goals can be formulated to help you exercise more scientifically and effectively. Count your exercise time, calorie burn, heart rate, and more anytime, anywhere, so you can stay motivated, keep going, and see how you've been doing lately. (Note: This product is not a medical device, all health data are for reference only, not as an absolute standard for judging health.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well for the price, mimics a certain watch style, okay features
reviews.reviewText: For the most part, I will say this is a really a cheaper alternative to the higher brand name watches. It has a very similar look to the apple watch look with even the button being in the same spot. That being said, the OS is somewhat of a mix of apple and android but more so apple. This is a decent watch for the price you are paying if you just looking for something that you do not really care about getting beat up. I actually enjoy having this for more of active wear and daily use. I do not have to worry about it getting scratched up or anything like apple watch. For the most part, this watch works pretty well with the readings and such. The watch does use a smartphone in order to sync the time and such so you do not have to worry about the time needing updating the time which is great. You do not need to be at your phone in order to get certain readings or use certain features. The only reason you want want your phone near by is to answer calls on your watch. It can also give you notifications from your phone although I have not been able to respond with the watch which is fine. I tried it with both apple and android and the messages do show up so you are able to receive notification from both operating systems although it works better with android in my opinion. The band is pretty solid but it does still feel a little cheap. It is easy to install but I do not expect it to be high end quality. It does fit pretty comfortably on my wrist although it does attract a good amount of dust. I do actually prefer to have a different band which is not silicone but I have not found anything that can replace this as of yet. In order to make sure the heart reading was accurate, I tested this product against a fitbit heart rate monitor. It utilizes the same technology to read pulse and heart beat. The watch reading was pretty close. It did not differ from the fitbit heart rate which is great. The sensor is pretty good but I would recommend wiping it down every so often. So the battery I would say needs to be charged every other day for me. That is because I do get a bunch of messages and I like to utilize my watch more frequently. It is not too hard to charge and takes a few hours to charge to full. Normally one overnight should be more than enough to charge it. The down side is the charger is a magnetic base and that can be a bit hard to replace in the future if you happen to need to get a replacement charger. The screen is not too easily to scratch up so I would not be too worried. The touch screen is pretty responsive which is nice. It does has the basic features I need which is to track my steps and heart rate. The app itself works relatively well and is pretty straight forward to use. It gives me my daily information. The application is required to setup. The application does not crash like many other applications do and is fairly UI friendly. It does take some time to get used to. Again the band is not bad but it does feel cheap. It is a simple silicone band and it can sometimes chafe the skin and feel bit slipper if you sweat. Overall this is a decent smartwatch to have if you are on a budget. I actually like this for how it looks and I do not care too much if it gets scratched up. I am not sure if it completely water proof and I do not intend to jump in the water with this. The battery does last at least a day. The reading for the pulse and heartbeat is pretty accurate. The watch has a nice look to it but the band is not the best. The only thing is that the charging base may be hard to replace in the future if it happens to break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly better than any Apple Watch!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: There are so many amazing perks with this watch, I don't even know where to begin! Do not let the price of this smart watch fool you! I previously owned an Apple Watch, (very expensive) and I would recommend this smart watch over the apple watch any day!!!The first thing that I NEED to point out about this watch is how long the battery lasts!!! The first time I used the watch it lasted for 8 days, the battery lasts a long time which is soooo very convenient.The watch is extremely user-friendly and connects seamlessly to both Android and iOS devices via Bluetooth. Everything on the watch and application is super easy to set up and use. I was honestly amazed at how much I love this product. You're able to take calls, send messages, and so much more!One of my absolute favorite things about this smart watch is that it has the ability to check your oxygen levels, blood pressure, heart rate, and even better, it tracks the different stages of your sleep schedule!! (Light sleep, Deep sleep, REM, and awake)It's so fashionable, It has a large HD screen which displays crisp and clear visuals even in bright sunlight. The watch looks beautiful while wearing it, and it has a lot of free faces to choose from. The interface is very intuitive and easy to navigate.Overall, I highly recommend this Smart Watch to anyone who is especially looking for a reliable fitness tracker that doesn't compromise on style or functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch but....
reviews.reviewText: If your looking to keep track of your health this is the watch! It would be nice if it had the feature of getting every text message notifications from your phone. It don't sync all your contacts like it should! I am able to take phone calls and make calls from the watch! I wish it had a feature to type a text from the watch! This watch works great though! The charger is a little bit tricky since the magnetic shield it has but after messing with it, I got my watch to charge! I think its neat how it tracks ovulation and menstrual periods which I got to wait for since I recently had a baby! Its nice how the watch tells you if your oxygen level, blood pressure and heart rate is normal! overall good watch but needs more features for my liking! The app needs some work for the contacts to add to the watch for notifications to pop up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This product is TRASH! Didn't last 90 days -should be warrantied but manufacture info is hidden
reviews.reviewText: This product is TRASH! Didn't last 90 days, trackers are wrong. Battery doesn't even last a day a, so your step counts are never correct because you have to stop and charge it. It just STOPPED working when placed on the charger one day. Amazon could not offer a warranty page to refer to, so basically it's a waste of money as opposed to my FitBit that I had for YEARS and when that wiped out, Fitbit gave me a discount on a new one. If you work out regularly do NOT buy this product. It will only frustrate you. Spend the extra and go with an Apple Watch or FitBit. They say when you buy cheap, you buy at least 3 times and that is cedrtainly true with this product. Disappointed and a waste of 70 bucks. DONT.

So, I got this $90 smartwatch, and I'm seriously impressed. First off, it looks cool - sleek and sturdy. The screen is easy to use, and it just feels nice on my wrist.Functionality-wise, this smartwatch punches above its weight. Accurate fitness tracking, seamless notifications, and impressive battery life make it a reliable daily companion. Its water resistance and compatibility with various apps elevate its versatility, offering features comparable to higher-end models at a fraction of the cost. For anyone seeking a budget-friendly yet high-performance smartwatch, this one is a five-star contender!

reviews.reviewTitle: outstanding design and very welcome feature
reviews.reviewText: I like the outstanding design and customable components. It's very convenient to connect to my cell phone to make calls and receive information. The battary can last about 7 days.Through the APP, I can download more beautiful watch faces can set my own favorite components.I like the adjustable magnetic band. I fits me very well. it's large, bright screen is clearly visible even in direct sunlight.

I absolutely love this smartwatch. It works as a normal smartwatch, but what sets it apart are these standout features:The built-in Bluetooth Call functionality and AI Voice make it incredibly convenient. You can answer calls directly from your wrist without the hassle of taking out your phone. It's a game-changer, especially when you're on the move or in situations where reaching for your phone isn't practical.This smartwatch goes beyond being a communication device; it's a comprehensive health companion. You can easily monitor your heartbeat and blood oxygen levels, gaining valuable insights into your overall well-being. Plus, it tracks your sleep quality, acting as a personal health coach on your wrist, helping you understand and improve your sleep patterns.Don't underestimate its IP67 rating. This watch can handle water exposure with ease. I've even worn it in the shower without any issues. Whether you're caught in the rain or want to keep it on during water-related activities, this smartwatch won't let you down.In conclusion, this smartwatch offers a seamless communication experience, robust health tracking capabilities, and the durability to withstand your daily adventures. It's become an essential part of my daily life, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and feature-packed smartwatch.

Très jolie montre connectée rose (j'adore!).Facile à configurer et ultra simple à apairer. Elle se connecte ensuite sans problème à mon téléphone.Le données paraissent réalistes, et pour avoir comparé chez mon médecin, la tension et le rythme cardiaque, c'est bien conforme!Voici plusieurs semaines que je m'en sers tous les jours et elle dure!!!! Elle est juste parfaite! C'est une bonne surprise et je recommande ++++

reviews.reviewTitle: Vielen Funktionen, edles Design. Ganzheitliche Darstellung der Werte im Display. APP notwendig.
reviews.reviewText: Auf den ersten Blick sieht diese Smartwatch mit Fitnesstracker sehr edel und innovativ aus und ist sehr gut und sauber verarbeitet. Das Gehäuse besteht aus einer robusten und strapazierfähigen Metall-Kunststoff-Kombination. Es besteht aus robustem Silikon, hat eine robuste Schnalle und eine Länge, die auch von Menschen getragen werden kann, die einen etwas größeren Gelenkumfang haben. Es ist robust, sehr gut und sauber verarbeitet und von sehr guter Qualität. Die Aufladung findet über ein spezielles USB-Kabel statt. Die Kontakte werden durch eine magnetische Kopplung des Steckers am Uhrengehäuse erreicht.Beim Display handelt es sich um ein sehr gutes und hochauflösendes Touch-Display. Es reagiert gut und schnell und ist gut ablesbar.Der Funktionsumfang der Software ist sehr umfangreich, so wie wir uns das vorstellen. Dazu gehört der Herzfrequenzmonitor, Schlafüberwachung, Schrittzähler, Kalorienverbrauch, Sauerstoffsättigungsmonitor, Aktivitätsübersicht, Timer, Wecker, usw.Was uns jedoch besonders gefällt ist, dass die Datenreihen sehr schön in Form von Grafiken bereits auf der Uhr dargestellt werden. Das ist richtig professionell umgesetzt. Wir möchten bereits unterwegs auf der Smartwatch die einzelnen Ergebnisse auf Stundenbasis in Form einer Grafik sehen und nicht erst die Daten auf das Smartphone laden um dann erst die Ergebnisse Dargestellt zu bekommen. Bei einer professionellen Tracking-Sequenz sollte keine APP nötig sein und das ist hier vorbildlich umgesetzt worden.Voraussetzung für die Nutzung und Einstellung bestimmter Stammdaten ist die Installation der APP auf dem Smartphone. Die APP möchte einige Freigaben am Smartphone haben, dies betrifft die Kommunikation mit der Uhr. Das ist für uns soweit ok. Auch das ist vorbildlich. Man braucht auch nicht immer ein Smartphone mit der APP, um diese Smartwatch mit Fitnesstracker betreiben zu können. Die Verbindung zwischen dem Trecker und dem Smartphone findet über Bluetooth statt. Wir nutzen Fitnesstracker sehr gerne, um umfangreiche Bio-Funktionen abzufragen und zu messen und danach unsere sportlichen Aktivitäten auszurichten. Wir nutzen ihn beim Walken, Joggen, Wandern, Radfahren und während der täglichen Arbeit.Die Blutdruckwerte sind mit Vorsicht zu sehen, denn gegen die Genauigkeit eines Armblutdruckmessgerätes kommen sie nicht an. Beispiel: Blutdruckwert auf Oberarm-Messgerät 168/89 auf dem Tracker zur fast gleichen Zeit 106/74 mmHg. Diese Werte sind nicht brauchbar. Das ist bei anderen Trackern aber ähnlich.Für diejenigen die 30-40 Minuten Power-Napping am Nachmittag machen sei gesagt, dass der Tracker bzw. der Sleeptimer diese Phasen nicht gut erkennt, sodass die Schlaftiefe und eine eventuelle REM-Phase beim Power-Napping nicht angezeigt werden. Der Sleeptimer arbeitet nachts hingegen sehr gut und ist für uns sehr wichtig. Hier sieht man sogar sehr deutlich, wie sich Umgebungslärm auf den Tiefschlaf auswirkt. Die REM-Phasen werden permanent unterbrochen, eventuell Ohrstöpsel einsetzen.Die ganzheitliche Visualisierung in der APP ist gut, unerlässlich, sinnvoll und interessant. Sie läuft auf unserem Samsung S23 Ultra problemlos. Auch die Bluetooth Verbindung funktionierte nach der Installation der APP sofort.Die Bedienungsanleitung ist in Wort und Bild verfasst und liegt bei.Die Smartwatch, die gleichzeitig ein Fitnesstracker ist, ist von der Software her sehr gut aufgestellt. Sie ist ein interessantes, sehr gut verarbeitetes und nützliches Produkt, welches wir täglich gerne nutzen, weil wir zusätzlich auch die Tagesaktivität sehen.
